item.description:
A trail circles lovely little Barrett Pond.  The Friends group wants to mark this trail so we should check it out.

We can then head west to the cranberry bogs on the edge of the park or head north to find the lost car of Three Cornered Pond Road.

Breakfast at 8:30 at Panera Bread in the Shops at 5 at Exit 5 off Route 3 in Plymouth. Please join us if you are able.

Bring water and snacks, good boots and sun/tick protection.

Hope to see you out there!

Map of Myles Standish State Forest
item.how_to_find_us: The "Equestrian lot" is on a dirt section of Halfway Pond Road, a well marked turn about a mile north on Lower College Pond Road from park headquarters. (Follow the signs past the Barrett Pond campground.) It is shown as Parking Lot #3 on park maps.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Hiking Club-- Grins and Barrett
